  id: # MANDATORY.
  title: # MANDATORY.
  application: 
  file-extension: 
  xref:

    fileformat: # https://www.fileformat.info

    mime: 
    pronom: # https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/pronom/fmt/
     - x-fmt/

    wikidata: Q
